body:
Hey Guys,
Got a small team going (5 players) & I was wondering how I rent a scrim server as advertised in the Omega update, like on this page http://i.imgur.com/NE9rdMm.png. Thanks,
Icy

title: Scrim Server Renting

replies.body: The scrim servers aren't open, but they'll be released soon.
replies.body_tagged: The scrim servers aren't open, but they'll be released soon.
